type.name: org.gradle.api.logging.Logging
type.description: The main entry point for Gradle's logging system. Gradle routes all logging via SLF4J. You can use either an SLF4J org.slf4j.Logger or a Gradle Logger to perform logging.

method.name: getLogger
method.description:
Returns the logger for the given class.
param:c the class.

returns:the logger. Never returns null.

method.name: getLogger
method.description:
Returns the logger with the given name.
param:name the logger name.

returns:the logger. Never returns null.

property.name: logger
property.description:
Returns the logger with the given name.
param:name the logger name.

returns:the logger. Never returns null.
